
messaggio (hello)
01101000 01100101 01101100 01101100 01101111


Encrypter:

- FME (messaggio -> cifrato)
000000|00.01101100.01100101.01101000  ->  00000|0|00.11100101.11111001.11111011
00000000.00000000.00000000.00|011011  ->  00000|0|01.11100011.11110100.00101100

- output:
00000000 11100101 11111001 11111011 00000001 11100011 11110100 00101100


Decrypter:

- FME (cifrato -> messaggio)
00000000.11100101.11111001.11111011  ->  000000|00.01101100.01100101.01101000
00000001.11100011.11110100.00101100  ->  00000000.00000000.00|011011.11|011011

- output:
01101000 01100101 01101100 01101100 01101111 00000000
